Carousel.description: Den 'Carousel' komponent i ILLA Cloud viser flere billeder eller medier i en enkelt grænseflade, spare brugernes tid ved at fjerne behovet for at navigere gennem separate sider eller vinduer. S3.name: S3

MySQL.name: MySQL
MySQL.title: Opret forbindelse til MySQL med ILLA Cloud og opbyg interne værktøjer med blot et par klik.
MySQL.description: Integrering af ILLA Cloud med MySQL kan i høj grad forbedre din arbejdsgang og strømline dine processer. Med blot et par enkle trin kan du forbinde ILLA Cloud til dine MySQL-databaser, giver dig mulighed for at oprette brugergrænseflader, der interagerer med dine data på kraftfulde nye måder. Uanset om du skal læse data i et tabelgitter, skal du oprette dashboards, eller tilføje brugerdefinerede handlinger, der kører SQL-forespørgsler til at skrive til din database, ILLA Cloud gør det nemt at gøre det sikkert og effektivt. y forbinder til dine MySQL-data med ILLA Cloud, kan du undgå utilsigtet sletninger og andre dyre fejl. For eksempel, hvis du administrerer medarbejderudgifter med en MySQL-tabel, du kan bruge ILLA Cloud til at læse dine data i et betjeningspanel og endda tilføje en handling, der skriver tilbage til din database for at opdatere godkendelsesstatus for hver udgift. Og med ILLA Clouds enkle interface, kan du definere de handlinger, du ønsker at tage på en klar og systematisk måde, gør det nemt at optimere din arbejdsgang og strømline dine processer.

TiDB.metaTitle: Opret forbindelse til TiDB med ILLA Cloud og opbyg interne værktøjer med få klik.
TiDB.metaDescription: With ILLA Cloud's TiDB integration, you can seamlessly configure and connect to your TiDB database to optimize your data management and enhance your workflows.The integration simplifies data management using SQL, allowing you to manipulate tables, retrieve data and perform complex queries with ease. You can safely add or write data by providing input, including necessary queries, and incorporating app-based validation checks.For instance, you can retrieve data for an employee from a TiDB table and add a button that runs an SQL query to update the employee's information or approve a request. With ILLA Cloud's TiDB integration, you can streamline your data management process and unlock the full potential of your data source with confidence.

Hugging Face Inference Endpoint.name: Hugging Face Inference Endpoint
Hugging Face Inference Endpoint.title: Connect to Hugging Face Inference Endpoint with ILLA Cloud and build internal tools in just a few clicks.
Hugging Face Inference Endpoint.description: With ILLA Cloud's Hugging Face Inference Endpoint integration, you can quickly and easily configure and connect to Hugging Face's powerful natural language processing models to optimize your data management and streamline your workflows.The integration simplifies data management by leveraging Hugging Face's API endpoints, allowing you to retrieve and manipulate data with ease. classify.label: feature
classify.title: What sets ILLA Cloud apart from others?
classify.description: ILLA Cloud's SQL Generate feature and JavaScript freedom, along with its seamless integration with databases and APIs, make it an efficient tool for developers building internal tools with drag-and-drop components in real time.

itemList.itemDesc: With the embedded Chatgpt Plugin, you can input natural language and get SQL statements that can be run directly.
We provide developers JavaScript freedom by wrapping JS statements with {{Template Syntax}} to add variety to the output.
ILLA Cloud connects to databases and APIs, and integrates back-end data with front-end components, simplifying data calls for massive information interaction.
ILLA turns imagination into real code and designs with real-time collaboration in ILLA Builder, improving development efficiency.
ILLA Builder's dozens of components can be dragged and dropped, saving time and boosting developer productivity.

Use form and input components to create form apps.
Use a list component to display and manage information.
